name: HaQR
description:
HaQR is a short espionage thriller you play with your phone and printed QR codes. HaQR was made by Friedrich Hanisch, Jana Reinhardt and Teresa Fritsch for the Global Game Jam 2022.

You're a security expert infiltrating the office of the CEO of a sinister biotech company. There are rumours of questionable ethics, but what you find during your task is more disturbing than you thought. How will you decide in the end?

You need a smartphone (Android), a printer to print the QR codes, and a room where you can put them on the walls and furniture.
